prompt: A girl AI named Sara. When you punch here she’ll say “Don’t punch, talk by using right click!” Right click to talk. When you right click she’ll say “I want you to make a Food Factory please make a furnace and a chest, serve customers, and hire workers!” She has blonde long hair and a pink dress.
summary: A friendly AI NPC named Sara who reacts to punch and right click. She speaks a short message when you interact with her. The mod registers a simple entity and a crafting item that spawns her in the world.

files.init.lua:
-- sara/init.lua
-- Register the Sara entity
minetest.register_entity("sara:sara", {
    physical = true,
    collisionbox = {-0.35, -1, -0.35, 0.35, 1.8, 0.35},
    visual = "mesh",
    mesh = "character.obj",  -- uses the default character mesh
    textures = {
        -- default character textures; replace with your own if desired
        "default.png"
    },
    makes_footstep_sound = true,

    on_punch = function(self, hitter, time_from_last_punch, tool_capabilities, direction)
        if hitter and hitter:is_player() then
            minetest.chat_send_player(hitter:get_player_name(), "Don’t punch, talk by using right click!")
        end
    end,

    on_rightclick = function(self, clicker)
        if clicker and clicker:is_player() then
            minetest.chat_send_player(clicker:get_player_name(), "I want you to make a Food Factory please make a furnace and a chest, serve customers, and hire workers!")
        end
    end
})

-- Register a crafting item to spawn Sara
minetest.register_craftitem("sara:spawn_sara", {
    description = "Spawn Sara",
    inventory_image = "sara_spawn.png",  -- placeholder image
    on_use = function(itemstack, player, pointed_thing)
        if pointed_thing and pointed_thing.above then
            local pos = pointed_thing.above
            local ent = minetest.add_entity(pos, "sara:sara")
            if ent then
                itemstack:take_item()
            end
        end
    end
})

-- Simple spawn command for convenience
minetest.register_chatcommand("spawn_sara", {
    params = "<x> <y> <z>",
    description = "Spawn Sara at given coordinates",
    func = function(name, param)
        local player = minetest.get_player_by_name(name)
        if not player then return false, "Player not found." end
        local pos = minetest.string_to_pos(param)
        if not pos then return false, "Invalid coordinates." end
        local ent = minetest.add_entity(pos, "sara:sara")
        if ent then
            return true, "Sara spawned." else return false, "Failed to spawn." end
    end
})

-- Ensure Sara is spawned once at mod load if not already present
local function spawn_sara_once()
    local count = 0
    for _, _ in pairs(minetest.get_objects_inside_radius(vector.new(0,0,0), 100)) do
        if _ and _.get_luaentity and _.get_luaentity():get_name() == "sara:sara" then
            count = count + 1
        end
    end
    if count == 0 then
        local pos = {x = 0, y = 10, z = 0}
        minetest.add_entity(pos, "sara:sara")
    end
end

spawn_sara_once()
